title: Introducing: Ziggy
body:
Perth rapper **Ziggy** certainly makes quite the mark on his debut EP, **_Black Thoughts_**.

Stylistically Drawing from the likes of Kendrick and Pusha, it pulls no punches – with several references to Lamar dropped throughout the three track release. EP highlight, _White Lies_, is four minutes of expertly constructed lyrical truths, and unashamedly in your face. Check it below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
